entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 1:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -34

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
